text: Osseus: Osteon! Osteon are you here!?
Rotta: Who is Osteon?
Osseus: My dear friend, and my partner. They were trying to stop Claviculus and his infernal machine.
Venel: Osteon is gone. Claviculus has them.
Osseus: What!? When?

Venel: Shortly after you left, the cult of the mechanicus came for us. We thought we were all doomed.
But then Osteon went with them… and they all left. The others are in hiding.
I only waited to bring you the news.
Osseus: Thank you Venel! Come, we have to hurry!
Gobkin: Who dis Clavy-clav-bone…icus?

Osseus: Once, they were our Bone Sage, our leader.
They are the most ancient skeleton here, thousands of years old, some say they might even be the first skeleton to rise.
They were wise and kind.
Rotta: Were? What happened?

Osseus: They became obsessed with fixing us. Most of us are missing bones, stolen or destroyed by adventurers passing through.
They were trying to find a way to meld other bones into our bodies as replacements… but it never worked.
They discovered though, they could reanimate individual groups of bones.
Now they are sacrificing hundreds of us to create an abomination.
Some are fanatical cultists, willingly sacrificing themselves.
But so many others were taken against their will.
It seems Osteon is now among them.
Gobkin: We finds Ost-bone-fwend. Do not worry.
Osseus: I hope so.
Osseus: What if we’re too late…
Rotta: We’re not.
Osseus: But what if we are!? I don’t know what I’d do if…
Gobkin: We finds, you see, we finds. We saves.
Osseus: Osteon!
Osteon: Osseus, what are you doing here!? Run!
Osseus: Not without you!  How did they capture you?
Claviculus Clepta: They came willingly…
Osseus: Willingly…?

Osteon: Claviculus and his cultists had us all cornered Osseus, there was no escape.
Claviculus gave me a choice, either I could volunteer and complete the Osteomechanicum…
or they would kill every Skeleton that followed me.
I’ve never made an easier choice.
Osseus: Let them go, Claviculus!
Rotta: Come on, let’s grind that skeleton’s bones to dust!
Claviculus: “I am doing what is NECESSARY! I will no longer be trod on by mortals! Batted aside like a cobweb for the amusement of humanity!”
Claviculus: Do not try to stop me! Don’t you see the Osteomechanicum is completed!
CLaviculus: With this I cannot be stopped!
Osseus: No! OSTEON! STOP IT CLAVICULUS!
Osteon: It’s okay, Osseus, my love, we met after death once… we will meet again, I know it.
Osseus: …until then.

Claviculus: Only now at the end do I see. So afraid of my people being destroyed…only to destroy them myself.
Promise me you’ll protect our people, Osseus. Don’t let our bones be scattered. We deserve life…just as much as the mortals do…
Osseus: Osteon? Osteon!?
Rotta: Osseus…
Osseus: Leave me here… I- I can’t go on without them.

Gobkin: I sowwy. I so sowwy.
We stay. Fwends stay together

Osseus: …Just like you to leave me a final parting gift.
Okay… I’m ready.
